aboutText: I am a Javascript Developer, graduated in Computer Science at Barão de Mauá's University since 2018. I have been working with ReactJS and React Native for the past 3 years. I also have worked with .NET Core, ExpressJS, PHP, SQL Server and Mongodb.

React JS Web Development - The Essentials Bootcamp
